title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scale AI agents with custom models using Amazon SageMaker AI & SGLang (AIM387)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon SageMaker AI 和 SGLang 通过自定义模型扩展 AI 代理 (AIM387)
abstract: Are you looking to customize foundation models and deploy AI agents at scale? Learn how to leverage Amazon SageMaker AI to build performant agentic workflows with customized open-weight models. This session covers the end-to-end journey: use Amazon SageMaker AI for model customization, track experiments with managed MLflow, establish governance with Amazon SageMaker AI Model Registry, and deploy optimized models using SGLang on Amazon SageMaker AI Inference for low-latency agent applications. Discover how to create repeatable, auditable workflows with Amazon SageMaker AI Pipelines while maintaining comprehensive observability and control for production AI systems. Includes a live demonstration of customizing and deploying an open-weight model, plus insights from SGLang's team on inference for agents.
abstract_cn: 您是否希望定制基础模型并大规模部署AI代理？了解如何利用Amazon SageMaker AI构建高性能的代理工作流，使用定制的开放权重模型。本课程涵盖端到端流程：使用Amazon SageMaker AI进行模型定制，通过托管MLflow跟踪实验，使用Amazon SageMaker AI模型注册表建立治理机制，并在Amazon SageMaker AI推理上使用SGLang部署优化模型，实现低延迟代理应用。探索如何使用Amazon SageMaker AI管道创建可重复、可审计的工作流，同时为生产AI系统保持全面的可观测性和控制。包括定制和部署开放权重模型的现场演示，以及SGLang团队关于代理推理的见解。
